entities.name: CALIFORNIA
entities.description: Location of the corporate headquarters, a large portion of data center capacity, and research and development activities

entities.name: ASIA
entities.description: Location of critical business operations, finished goods inventory, and some suppliers

entities.name: RUSSIA
entities.description: Country involved in the invasion of Ukraine, affecting employees and operations

entities.name: UKRAINE
entities.description: Country invaded by Russia, affecting employees and operations

relationships.relationship_description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine has had and will likely continue to have a negative impact on employees or operations both within and outside these regions
Corporate headquarters and other critical business operations are located in California and Asia, making operations vulnerable to natural disasters in these geographical areas
